column4: im thinking a java web interface that will let me visit http://myvpsipaddress/browser.php from my laptop that will browse as if from that machine
ssh -D7070 user@your-vps , then configure your browser to use "SOCKS-proxy on localhost:7070"
ssh -D7070 user@your-vps on your local machine
putty has an option to create dynamic-tunnels or however they call it. check the config-dialogs
